ing: 1 (16 ounce) bottle ranch salad dressing (such as Hidden ValleyÂ® Original RanchÂ®)
1 tablespoon hot pepper sauce (such as TabascoÂ®)
1 tablespoon hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHotÂ®)
des: "This is for the person looking for a spicy ranch dip. It's great served with fries, poppers, and even wings."
ins: Stir together the ranch-style salad dressing, the two hot pepper sauces, cayenne pepper, and chili powder. Chill for at least one hour.
